newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesia SIR20 rubber flat in late trading.
newsitem.headline: Indonesia SIR20 rubber flat in late trading.

text.p: Indonesian benchmark tyre-grade SIR20 offer prices were flat in slow late trading on Monday, with no deals heard in Medan almost for two weeks, dealers said.
"Dealers in Palembang and Padang are willing to secure deals at lower prices that's why we see deals mostly coming out of these two cities and not from Medan," one Jakarta dealer said.

Dealers said SIR20 offer prices for November/December were at at 55.00-55.50 U.S. cents/lb fob Medan and at 54.50-55.00 cents fob Palembang, Surabaya and Padang, and at 54.50-54.75 cents fob Jambi and Pontianak.
The Jakarta dealer said trading on Mondays was usually slow, but said deals were likely to be done on Tuesday following some fresh enquiries from Singapore today.
High amoniac latex for export was last traded at 90 cents/kg fob Medan for October deliveries, down from 108 cents last week, dealers said.

One Medan-based latex dealer said he had shipped some 2,300 tonnes of latex mostly to the U.S. this month and expected to ship an additional 800 tonnes later this month following deals done in recent months. -- Jakarta newsroom +6221 384-6364
